meanings.sent1: The pinocytic process helps cells take in nutrients.
meanings.sent2: The pinocytic cells absorbed the liquid quickly.
meanings.sent3: The pinocytic cells were like tiny sponges soaking up all the water.
meanings.sent4: Her pinocytic ability to absorb information was remarkable.
meanings.sent5: The pinocytic nature of the cells made them efficient at nutrient intake.

meanings.sent1: The pinocytic membrane allowed for rapid absorption.
meanings.sent2: The pinocytic nature of the cells enabled quick uptake of substances.
meanings.sent3: The pinocytic cells were like eager little vacuum cleaners.
meanings.sent4: His mind was pinocytic, always eager to learn new things.
meanings.sent5: The pinocytic characteristics of the cells made them efficient at their job.

meanings.definition: Pertaining to the process of pinocytosis.
meanings.sent1: The pinocytic mechanism is essential for nutrient absorption.
meanings.sent2: Pinocytic activity increases when cells need more nutrients.
meanings.sent3: The pinocytic process was like a tiny dance of absorption.
meanings.sent4: Her pinocytic approach to learning was effective.
meanings.sent5: The pinocytic process of the cells was fascinating to observe.
